condition.description:
Raynaud's disease is a rare disorder of the blood vessels, usually in the fingers and toes. It causes the blood vessels to narrow when you are cold or feeling stressed. When this happens, blood can't get to the surface of the skin and the affected areas turn white and blue. When the blood flow returns, the skin turns red and throbs or tingles. In severe cases, loss of blood flow can cause sores or tissue death.

Primary Raynaud's happens on its own. The cause is not known. There is also secondary Raynaud's, which is caused by injuries, other diseases, or certain medicines.

People in colder climates are more likely to develop Raynaud's. It is also more common in women, people with a family history, and those over age 30.

Treatment for Raynaud's may include drugs to keep the blood vessels open. There are also simple things you can do yourself, such as

  • Soaking hands in warm water at the first sign of an attack
  • Keeping your hands and feet warm in cold weather
  • Avoiding triggers, such as certain medicines and stress

NIH: National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute
condition.name: Raynaud's phenomenon

carousel_items: Comes in two differents doses: one that's taken on a regular basis and the other only when you need it.
If you're taking Cialis on a regular basis, take it at the same time every day.
Don't take [name_ommon] more than once a day.
Can be taken with or without food.
Don't drink a lot of alcohol when you're taking this medication since it can make dizziness worse.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness.

basics.benefits_moa: Cialis is a PDE-5 inhibitor. Blocking PDE-5 allows blood to enter the penis and helps create an erection. Cialis also treats enlarged prostate symptoms.
basics.bottom_line: Cialis is the only medication in its class that treats both erectile dysfunction and enlarged prostate symptoms. You can also take it on a regular basis, which can allow for more spontaneity, but it can be expensive.
downsides: Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

downsides_processed.orig: Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

upsides: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
It's the only one in its class to also treat enlarged prostate symptoms.
Can be taken either as needed, or on a regular basis (which allows you to be more spontaneous before sex).
Can be taken with or without food.
Lasts longer than Viagra.

upsides_processed.orig: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
It's the only one in its class to also treat enlarged prostate symptoms.
Can be taken either as needed, or on a regular basis (which allows you to be more spontaneous before sex).
Can be taken with or without food.
Lasts longer than Viagra.

userStories.tip: Dosages are probably too high that are prescribed. Even a tiny dose helps.
Does cause some headaches. Works fast (20 min). Works for 48 (and sometimes more) hours
improved urination as well as improved erections

drugs.name: Cialis

carousel_items_processed.orig: Comes in two differents doses: one that's taken on a regular basis and the other only when you need it.
If you're taking Cialis on a regular basis, take it at the same time every day.
Don't take [name_ommon] more than once a day.
Can be taken with or without food.
Don't drink a lot of alcohol when you're taking this medication since it can make dizziness worse.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness.

risks_warnings.title: Heart attack or stroke
risks_warnings.description: Taking Cialis for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past. Also, it is not recommended for men to take Cialis if they've had a heart attack in the past 3 months or a stroke or a diagnosis of moderate to severe heart failure in the past 6 months.  Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.

description_processed.orig: Taking Cialis for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past. Also, it is not recommended for men to take Cialis if they've had a heart attack in the past 3 months or a stroke or a diagnosis of moderate to severe heart failure in the past 6 months.  Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.

risks_warnings.title: Prolonged erection
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Cialis. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Cialis. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

risks_warnings.title: Vision changes
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

risks_warnings.title: Hearing loss
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

carousel_items: It's best to take Levitra about 1 hour before sexual activity, but you can take it anywhere between 4 hours and 30 minutes before you need it.
Don't take it more than once a day.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, a headache, or dizziness.

basics.benefits_moa: Levitra is a PDE-5 inhibitor. Blocking PDE-5 allows blood to enter the penis and helps create an erection.
basics.bottom_line: Levitra is a first-choice treatment for erectile dysfunction. However, you have to take it at least 60 minutes prior to sex, so the lack of spontaneity may not be good for some people. It can also be expensive.
downsides: Needs to be taken at least 60 minutes before sex.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.
You need to reduce the amount of grapefruit you eat while taking Levitra.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

downsides_processed.orig: Needs to be taken at least 60 minutes before sex.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.
You need to reduce the amount of grapefruit you eat while taking Levitra.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

upsides: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
It can be taken only when you need it.
It can be taken with or without food.
Available in two different forms, as a regular tablet and as an orally-disintegrating tablet.

If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.

risks_warnings.title: Heart attack or stroke
risks_warnings.description: Taking Levitra for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past, especially in the past 6 months and is not recommended. Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.
risk_factors: Having a heart attack, stroke, or rhythm problem in your heart in the last 6 months
Having low or high blood pressure
Heart failure or coronary artery disease causing unstable angina (chest pain)

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking alpha blockers or medications for high blood pressure and you're taking Levitra, your blood pressure may become too low. Be very careful getting up from a sitting or lying down position since this can make you feel dizzy and more likely to fall. Talk to your doctor if your medications need to be changed.
risk_factors: Taking medications for high blood pressure

description_processed.orig: If you're taking alpha blockers or medications for high blood pressure and you're taking Levitra, your blood pressure may become too low. Be very careful getting up from a sitting or lying down position since this can make you feel dizzy and more likely to fall. Talk to your doctor if your medications need to be changed.

risks_warnings.title: Heart rhythm problems
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking medications to control your heart rhythm, taking Levitra can make the rhythm worse. Talk to your doctor to see if you need an alternate medication for your erectile dysfunction.
risk_factors: Taking medications to control your heart rhythm

carousel_items: Need to take this drug at the same time every day.
Can cause a headache, flushing, or nosebleeds.
Don't take two doses at the same time if you missed a dose.
The oral liquid (suspension) is good for 60 days or 2 months. Make sure to shake it well before using.

basics.benefits_moa: Revatio is a PDE-5 inhibitor. It relaxes blood vessels in the lungs, which lowers their blood pressure.
basics.bottom_line: Revatio is a first-choice treatment for pulmonary hypertension (high blood pressure in the lungs).
downsides: Can cause dizziness during the first few days of taking this medication.
If you're using Revatio for high blood pressure in the lungs, you can't use Viagra or other erectile dysfunction drugs.
You also can't use other forms of nitrates or nitroglycerin while on Revatio.

downsides_processed.orig: Can cause dizziness during the first few days of taking this medication.
If you're using Revatio for high blood pressure in the lungs, you can't use Viagra or other erectile dysfunction drugs.
You also can't use other forms of nitrates or nitroglycerin while on Revatio.

upsides: It's a first-choice medication for treating high blood pressure in the lungs.
It's available as a generic medication.
Different doses of Sildenafil are also used to treat erectile dysfunction.

upsides_processed.orig: It's a first-choice medication for treating high blood pressure in the lungs.
It's available as a generic medication.
Different doses of Sildenafil are also used to treat erectile dysfunction.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure in your lungs.

carousel_items: It's best to take Viagra about 1 hour before sexual activity, but you can take it anywhere between 4 hours and 30 minutes before you need it.
Don't take it more than once a day.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, a headache, or dizziness.
Works best when taken on an empty stomach. Fatty foods can prevent Viagra from working as well.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Viagra is a PDE-5 inhibitor. Blocking PDE-5 allows blood to enter the penis and helps create an erection.
basics.bottom_line: Viagra is a first-choice treatment for erectile dysfunction. It's the only one that's available as a generic, so it's cheaper than the alternatives. However, you need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex, so the lack of spontaneity may not be good for some people.
downsides: You need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex.
Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).
Taking it after eating a high-fat meal can delay or reduce the medication's benefits.

downsides_processed.orig: You need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex.

carousel_items: Can cause dizziness or headaches in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Can cause face flushing and ankle or foot swelling.
Avoid grapefruit while taking this medicine.
Your doctor might do routine blood tests to check your liver function.

basics.benefits_moa: Nifedipine is a calcium channel blocker. It lowers blood pressure by slowing your heart rate and relaxing your blood vessels. Your heart gets more oxygen and doesn't have to work as hard to pump, which can relieve chest pain.
basics.bottom_line: Nifedipine works well to lower blood pressure and prevent chest pain, but you have to be okay with avoiding grapefruit. You can't miss doses, and you might get persistent swelling.
downsides: Calcium channel blockers can cause swelling in your limbs. If this happens for you, it probably won't get better over time, so talk to your doctor about alternatives if it bothers you.
Women are more likely to have side effects (especially swelling) from Nifedipine than men.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Nifedipine suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Not a good medication for you if you love grapefruit. It can make Nifedipine have a stronger effect on your blood pressure.

downsides_processed.orig: Calcium channel blockers can cause swelling in your limbs. If this happens for you, it probably won't get better over time, so talk to your doctor about alternatives if it bothers you.
Women are more likely to have side effects (especially swelling) from Nifedipine than men.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Nifedipine suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Not a good medication for you if you love grapefruit. It can make Nifedipine have a stronger effect on your blood pressure.

upsides: A first-choice blood pressure treatment for many people.
Calcium channel blockers work especially well for African Americans to lower blood pressure.
You can take it alone or with other medicines to help lower blood pressure.
Lowers the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Prevents heart-related chest pain (angina) if you take it regularly.
Treats certain abnormal heart rhythms.

upsides_processed.orig: A first-choice blood pressure treatment for many people.
Calcium channel blockers work especially well for African Americans to lower blood pressure.
You can take it alone or with other medicines to help lower blood pressure.
Lowers the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Prevents heart-related chest pain (angina) if you take it regularly.
Treats certain abnormal heart rhythms.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure and controls heart rate.

userStories.tip: Swelling pain in limbs, so intense in the feet (turned puffy bright red) couldn't stand up had to elevate for hours, wasn't worth the trouble.

drugs.name: Nifedipine

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause dizziness or headaches in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Can cause face flushing and ankle or foot swelling.
Avoid grapefruit while taking this medicine.
Your doctor might do routine blood tests to check your liver function.

risks_warnings.title: Intestinal blockage
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of obstruction within the intestines, sometimes requiring surgery. If you develop sudden constipation, especially if accompanied with a fever, contact your doctor immediately.
risk_factors: Taking anti-inflammatories, acid reducers in the stomach, anticholinergics, laxatives, levothyroxine

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of obstruction within the intestines, sometimes requiring surgery. If you develop sudden constipation, especially if accompanied with a fever, contact your doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Chest pain
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of increased chest pain when people have started taking this medication, especially if they are on beta-blockers. Let your doctor know if you are on beta-blockers if they do not know this. Your doctor will talk to you about how to take care of this.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of increased chest pain when people have started taking this medication, especially if they are on beta-blockers. Let your doctor know if you are on beta-blockers if they do not know this. Your doctor will talk to you about how to take care of this.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage/jaundice
risks_warnings.description: Reports of liver damage have occurred while on this medication, especially if you have had cirrhosis. Your doctor will monitor your liver on a regular basis. Tell your doctor if you or your caregivers/family notice your skin or the whites of your eyes are becoming yellower, pain in your abdomen, or sudden confusion.

description_processed.orig: Reports of liver damage have occurred while on this medication, especially if you have had cirrhosis. Your doctor will monitor your liver on a regular basis. Tell your doctor if you or your caregivers/family notice your skin or the whites of your eyes are becoming yellower, pain in your abdomen, or sudden confusion.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: Sudden drops in blood pressure have been noted while on this medication, with possible heart attacks. Talk to your doctor about the signs of a heart attack and call 911 immediately if you experience these.

description_processed.orig: Sudden drops in blood pressure have been noted while on this medication, with possible heart attacks. Talk to your doctor about the signs of a heart attack and call 911 immediately if you experience these.

risks_warnings.title: Congestive heart failure
risks_warnings.description: Rare reports of congestive heart failure have been reported in people taking this medication with beta blockers. Make sure your prescriber is aware that you are taking this medication.

description_processed.orig: Rare reports of congestive heart failure have been reported in people taking this medication with beta blockers. Make sure your prescriber is aware that you are taking this medication.

risks_warnings.title: Heart attack or increased chest pain
risks_warnings.description: Reports of chest pain/angina and heart attack have been noted in people who have obstructive coronary artery disease while on this medication. Tell your doctor if you have this condition or if you have concerns.

description_processed.orig: Reports of chest pain/angina and heart attack have been noted in people who have obstructive coronary artery disease while on this medication. Tell your doctor if you have this condition or if you have concerns.

carousel_items: Can cause dizziness in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Interacts with the cholesterol medicine Simvastatin.
Can cause ankle or foot swelling.
Can cause gum overgrowth. Ask your dentist to check for this side effect.

basics.benefits_moa: Amlodipine is a calcium channel blocker. It lowers blood pressure by slowing your heart rate and relaxing your blood vessels. Your heart gets more oxygen and doesn't have to work as hard to pump, which can relieve chest pain.
basics.bottom_line: Amlodipine works well to lower blood pressure and prevent chest pain. You can't miss doses, and you might get persistent swelling.
downsides: Calcium channel blockers can cause swelling in your limbs. If this happens for you, it probably won't get better over time, so talk to your doctor about alternatives if it bothers you.
Women are more likely to have side effects (especially swelling) from Amlodipine than men.
Some people might experience flushing with this medication.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Amlodipine suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.
If you have severe heart disease, using Amlodipine might increase your risk of chest pain or heart attack during the time right after starting the medication or raising the dosage.
Might not be a good choice if you have liver disease.

downsides_processed.orig: Calcium channel blockers can cause swelling in your limbs. If this happens for you, it probably won't get better over time, so talk to your doctor about alternatives if it bothers you.
Women are more likely to have side effects (especially swelling) from Amlodipine than men.
Some people might experience flushing with this medication.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Amlodipine suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.
If you have severe heart disease, using Amlodipine might increase your risk of chest pain or heart attack during the time right after starting the medication or raising the dosage.
Might not be a good choice if you have liver disease.

upsides: A first-choice blood pressure treatment for many people.
Calcium channel blockers work especially well for African Americans to lower blood pressure.
Lowers the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Prevents heart-related chest pain (angina) if you take it regularly.
Each dose lasts longer than other calcium channel blockers, which keeps blood pressure consistent without big ups and downs.
Particularly good at lowering systolic blood pressure (the top number), so it's a good option for older people who can commonly get high blood pressure only in the top number.

upsides_processed.orig: A first-choice blood pressure treatment for many people.
Calcium channel blockers work especially well for African Americans to lower blood pressure.
Lowers the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Prevents heart-related chest pain (angina) if you take it regularly.
Each dose lasts longer than other calcium channel blockers, which keeps blood pressure consistent without big ups and downs.
Particularly good at lowering systolic blood pressure (the top number), so it's a good option for older people who can commonly get high blood pressure only in the top number.

userStories.tip:
I wish I had known about the large number of side effects.  Legs swelled to above the knee right away and diuretics did not help.  Sense of smell decreased. 
Too many others to list.  Didn't help BP much.
Discontinued after one pill due to terrible chest pain.
Had to adjust dosage because it caused calf ankle foot swelling.  Still an issue but it helps with the chest pain.

Resisted being put on this stuff for years for fear of swelling. Sure enough, I experienced pitting edema in legs and feet - MD changed my diuretic which took all the fluid off. BP is the best it's been in my whole life though!

drugs.name: Norvasc

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause dizziness in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Interacts with the cholesterol medicine Simvastatin.
Can cause ankle or foot swelling.
Can cause gum overgrowth. Ask your dentist to check for this side effect.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: You can experience dizziness due to a drop in blood pressure.  This is a common early side effect of many medications that lower blood pressure including Amlodipine.  Typically this will go away over time as your body gets used to the lowered blood pressure. It may be more likely to occur when you change posture, such as going from sitting to standing.  If you're sensitive to low blood pressure, change position slowly.  If the dizziness is unbearable then talk with your doctor.  A different medication may be better for you.

description_processed.orig: You can experience dizziness due to a drop in blood pressure.  This is a common early side effect of many medications that lower blood pressure including Amlodipine.  Typically this will go away over time as your body gets used to the lowered blood pressure. It may be more likely to occur when you change posture, such as going from sitting to standing.  If you're sensitive to low blood pressure, change position slowly.  If the dizziness is unbearable then talk with your doctor.  A different medication may be better for you.

risks_warnings.title: Heart attack
risks_warnings.description: Worsening heart pain or increased risk of heart attack is possible when you first start taking Amlodipine.  This can also happen after you increase the dose of Amlodipine. Notify your doctor immediately if you experience any heart pain, radiating jaw pain, crushing chest pain, or persistent racing heartbeat.

description_processed.orig: Worsening heart pain or increased risk of heart attack is possible when you first start taking Amlodipine.  This can also happen after you increase the dose of Amlodipine. Notify your doctor immediately if you experience any heart pain, radiating jaw pain, crushing chest pain, or persistent racing heartbeat.

risks_warnings.title: Special dosing requirements
risks_warnings.description: Your body uses your liver to break down Amlodipine and remove it from your blood. If you have liver disease you may not be able to remove Amlodipine as quickly from your blood as someone with a healthy liver. You should increase the dose of Amlodipine slowly and watch closely for how it is working in your body.  Increasing the dose slowly will lower your chances of having side effects.

description_processed.orig: Your body uses your liver to break down Amlodipine and remove it from your blood. If you have liver disease you may not be able to remove Amlodipine as quickly from your blood as someone with a healthy liver. You should increase the dose of Amlodipine slowly and watch closely for how it is working in your body.  Increasing the dose slowly will lower your chances of having side effects.

risks_warnings.title: Foot and leg swelling (edema)
risks_warnings.description: Amlodipine can cause varying degrees of swelling in your limbs. The most commonly affected areas are your feet, ankles, legs, or occasionally your arms. Swelling may be worse if you have other conditions that makes it hard for your body to get rid of fluids such as congestive heart failure or kidney disease. If your swelling is caused by Amlodipine, it should improve when you stop taking the medication. If the swelling is bothersome, a different medication may be better for you.

description_processed.orig: Amlodipine can cause varying degrees of swelling in your limbs. The most commonly affected areas are your feet, ankles, legs, or occasionally your arms. Swelling may be worse if you have other conditions that makes it hard for your body to get rid of fluids such as congestive heart failure or kidney disease. If your swelling is caused by Amlodipine, it should improve when you stop taking the medication. If the swelling is bothersome, a different medication may be better for you.

carousel_items: Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Can cause drowsiness, headache, dizziness, and nausea.
Take with food or at bedtime to avoid side effects.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.
Recheck your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine.

basics.benefits_moa: Prazosin is a selective alpha blocker. It lowers blood pressure by relaxing blood vessels. It also relaxes the urethra and prostate, which makes it easier to urinate.
basics.bottom_line: Prazosin is used mostly to make urination easier for men with an enlarged prostate, but it can cause dizziness.
downsides: Not the best medicine to lower blood pressure by itself.
Likely to cause orthostatic hypotension. This means dizziness when you change positions (like standing up) because your blood pressure doesn't adjust quickly enough.
Not preferred for people 65 years or older.

downsides_processed.orig: Not the best medicine to lower blood pressure by itself.
Likely to cause orthostatic hypotension. This means dizziness when you change positions (like standing up) because your blood pressure doesn't adjust quickly enough.
Not preferred for people 65 years or older.

upsides: Can be added to other blood pressure-lowering medicines if you need additional blood pressure control.
Makes urination easier in men with an enlarged prostate.
Helps people with PTSD get better sleep with fewer, less-intense nightmares.

upsides_processed.orig: Can be added to other blood pressure-lowering medicines if you need additional blood pressure control.
Makes urination easier in men with an enlarged prostate.
Helps people with PTSD get better sleep with fewer, less-intense nightmares.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure and makes it easier to urinate.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure (orthostatic hypotension)
risks_warnings.description: You can feel dizzy or fall from a sudden drop in blood pressure when you change positions, such as going from sitting to standing. This is called orthostatic hypotension. If you're sensitive to low blood pressure, change position slowly until your body is used to the medicine. If symptoms continues for more than a week, dose adjustment or a different medication may be needed.

description_processed.orig: You can feel dizzy or fall from a sudden drop in blood pressure when you change positions, such as going from sitting to standing. This is called orthostatic hypotension. If you're sensitive to low blood pressure, change position slowly until your body is used to the medicine. If symptoms continues for more than a week, dose adjustment or a different medication may be needed.

carousel_items: Take in the morning with food to avoid side effects.
Takes about 8 to 12 weeks to see the medication's full effects on your mood.
Stop taking it slowly to avoid getting withdrawal symptoms.
Tell your doctor if you notice sudden mood changes or unusual thoughts.

basics.benefits_moa: Prozac is a selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor (SSRI) antidepressant. It increases serotonin activity in the brain, which regulates mood.
basics.bottom_line: Prozac is good for treating depression and anxiety. It's more energizing than other antidepressants, but may not be the best choice for people who have trouble sleeping.
downsides: Can cause sexual side effects like low libido and an inability to orgasm or ejaculate.
Can increase feelings of anxiety or cause headaches during the first few weeks of taking it. These effects should go away over time.
More likely than other antidepressants to interact with other medications you're taking.
Like most antidepressants, it can cause a higher risk of suicidal thoughts and behavior for people younger than 24.
The first antidepressant you try doesn't always work or it can cause side effects you really don't like. You might need to try a few different medications until you find one that works for you.

downsides_processed.orig: Can cause sexual side effects like low libido and an inability to orgasm or ejaculate.
Can increase feelings of anxiety or cause headaches during the first few weeks of taking it. These effects should go away over time.
More likely than other antidepressants to interact with other medications you're taking.
Like most antidepressants, it can cause a higher risk of suicidal thoughts and behavior for people younger than 24.
The first antidepressant you try doesn't always work or it can cause side effects you really don't like. You might need to try a few different medications until you find one that works for you.

upsides: Effective at relieving depression and anxiety symptoms.
Lowers relapse rates of depression and bulimia nervosa.
Causes less sleepiness than other antidepressants.
It's more energizing than other antidepressants, so it's good for people who have low energy.
It has been used to treat depression for a long time, so there's a lot of information available about how it works and how safe it is.
Six out of ten people who use an antidepressant for the first time find that it works for them.

drugs.name: Prozac

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take in the morning with food to avoid side effects.
Takes about 8 to 12 weeks to see the medication's full effects on your mood.
Stop taking it slowly to avoid getting withdrawal symptoms.
Tell your doctor if you notice sudden mood changes or unusual thoughts.

risks_warnings.title: Suicidal thoughts or behavior
risks_warnings.description: Prozac may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately. Prozac is not approved for use in children younger than age 18.

description_processed.orig: Prozac may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately. Prozac is not approved for use in children younger than age 18.

risks_warnings.title: Serotonin syndrome
risks_warnings.description: Serotonin syndrome is a rare but potentially life-threatening condition caused when there's too much serotonin active in the brain. Your risk goes up if you use Prozac with other medications that affect serotonin (other antidepressants, lithium, triptans, St. John's wort). Symptoms include fast heart rate, sweating, muscle stiffness or spasms, fever, and confusion. Get medical attention right away if you have symptoms. Also, Prozac takes a long time to completely clear from your body. Make sure enough time is allowed to clear the medication completely before switching to another medication that affects serotonin, especially an MAO-I antidepressant.
risk_factors: Using other medications that affect serotonin

description_processed.orig: Serotonin syndrome is a rare but potentially life-threatening condition caused when there's too much serotonin active in the brain. Your risk goes up if you use Prozac with other medications that affect serotonin (other antidepressants, lithium, triptans, St. John's wort). Symptoms include fast heart rate, sweating, muscle stiffness or spasms, fever, and confusion. Get medical attention right away if you have symptoms. Also, Prozac takes a long time to completely clear from your body. Make sure enough time is allowed to clear the medication completely before switching to another medication that affects serotonin, especially an MAO-I antidepressant.

risks_warnings.title: Withdrawal
risks_warnings.description: Stopping Prozac suddenly may cause withdrawal symptoms such as nausea, anxiety, agitation, flu-like symptoms, trouble sleeping, and dizziness. Withdrawal symptoms usually occur within 3 days of stopping the medication, and go away within 1 to 2 weeks. Work with your doctor to gradually reduce your dose.

description_processed.orig: Stopping Prozac suddenly may cause withdrawal symptoms such as nausea, anxiety, agitation, flu-like symptoms, trouble sleeping, and dizziness. Withdrawal symptoms usually occur within 3 days of stopping the medication, and go away within 1 to 2 weeks. Work with your doctor to gradually reduce your dose.

risks_warnings.title: Heart problems
risks_warnings.description: Prozac can increase your risk of irregular heartbeat. If you have any risk factors, the maximum dose for you may be lower. Heart and blood tests may be required before starting treatment.

description_processed.orig: Prozac can increase your risk of irregular heartbeat. If you have any risk factors, the maximum dose for you may be lower. Heart and blood tests may be required before starting treatment.

risks_warnings.title: Increased bleeding
risks_warnings.description: Prozac can increase the risk of bleeding or bruising if you're also taking aspirin, NSAIDs (like ibuprofen), warfarin, or other anticoagulants. Tell your doctor about any bruising that doesn't improve, black stools, pink or red urine, or unusual bleeding (for example, from the nose or gums).

description_processed.orig: Prozac can increase the risk of bleeding or bruising if you're also taking aspirin, NSAIDs (like ibuprofen), warfarin, or other anticoagulants. Tell your doctor about any bruising that doesn't improve, black stools, pink or red urine, or unusual bleeding (for example, from the nose or gums).

risks_warnings.title: Sexual dysfunction
risks_warnings.description: Prozac can cause lower sex drive or difficulty having an orgasm. If the problem persists after the first 2 to 3 months, you can talk to your doctor about alternative antidepressants or performance-enhancing medications.

description_processed.orig: Prozac can cause lower sex drive or difficulty having an orgasm. If the problem persists after the first 2 to 3 months, you can talk to your doctor about alternative antidepressants or performance-enhancing medications.

risks_warnings.title: Mania
risks_warnings.description: Sometimes, depression is the first symptom of bipolar disorder. Treating someone with bipolar disorder with an antidepressant alone can cause a manic episode (great excitement, euphoria, delusions, and overactivity). Make sure your doctor has screened you for a personal or family history of bipolar disorder or symptoms, and a family history of suicide.

description_processed.orig: Sometimes, depression is the first symptom of bipolar disorder. Treating someone with bipolar disorder with an antidepressant alone can cause a manic episode (great excitement, euphoria, delusions, and overactivity). Make sure your doctor has screened you for a personal or family history of bipolar disorder or symptoms, and a family history of suicide.

surveys.question: Besides medications, what else has worked for you?
What tip would you give someone like me who was just diagnosed?
